Eligible subject randomize 2:1 ratio ( active : placebo ) receive 1 2 treatment : 1.5g eMG ( 4 capsule total ) match placebo capsule QD 6 month . Primary objective : To compare maintenance remission mild moderate ulcerative colitis measure rectal bleeding endoscopic mucosal appearance 6 month treatment encapsulate mesalamine granule ( eMG ) 1.5 g QD , compare placebo . Secondary objective : To compare safety tolerability long-term dosing eMG 1.5 g QD compare placebo maintenance remission mild moderate UC .
